description: The Innovation, Information and Technology Branch (IITB) of the Employment Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires a variety of Information Management (IM)/Information Technology (IT) professional resource services with knowledge and experience supporting and assisting with Government of Canada strategize and realise its cloud adoption model and how it will become a cloud native department.
full_summary:
=================================
# Cloud Enterprise Professional Services

### Reference Information

| Key | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Reference | CB-8911-72851302 |
| Solicitation Number | 100024283 |
| Publication Date | September 11, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 3, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST) |
| Amendment Number | 3 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | November 1, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | November 1, 2024 |

### Project Description

The Government of Canada is seeking a provider to deliver Cloud Enterprise Professional Services for the Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC). The services aim to support ESDC in strategizing and implementing a cloud adoption model and enabling the department to become a cloud-native organization.

### Key Deliverables

- Information Management (IM)/Information Technology (IT) professional resource services
- Assistance in planning and executing the cloud adoption model
- Provision of IT services to support ESDC's cloud transformation

### Eligibility Requirements

- The proposer must hold a valid Certificate of Registration with the Canadian Trade Register.
- The proposer may be required to meet additional eligibility requirements, as outlined in the solicited documentation.

### Qualification Criteria

- The proposal will be evaluated on the basis of:
  - Combined score for Technical Merit (40%): Evaluation of the proposer's technical capabilities and expertise.
  - Combined score for Price (60%): Evaluation of the proposer's price and commercial advantages.

### Tenders and Attachments

* Tender documentation may be obtained from the Canadabuys site at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8911/100024283-npp.pdf
* The Government of Canada reserves the right to amend or cancel the tender at any time.

### Points of Contact

- Contact information:
  - Name: Michelle Pauzé
  - Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
  - Phone: (999) 999-9999
- Contact this department for more information or to inquire about the tender.  END.
